channel.title: Icon help
channel.description:
Project insanity
When a mod pms they have the donator icon... when a donator pms they have the owner icon ... any suggestions
Please note if you did not read the top of this please relaise its project insanity i dont need delta fixes

did u even do what the guy said about checking the paths client side that deal with crowns and make sure they are ok? that seems to the problem i dont think its server side at all

item.title: Icon help
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

ok im sorry for that. ok your yell command is in client.java so search for (“yell”) and replace your yell command with mine. Make sure to back up your client.java

if (command.startsWith("yell") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 0) {
                String titles = "";

              
                if (playerRights == 1) {
                    titles = "@whi@[Moderator]-";
                }
                if (playerRights == 2) {
                    titles = "@whi@[Admin]-";
                }
                if (playerRights == 3) {
                    titles = "@blu@[Owner]- ";
                }
                if (donator == 1 && playerRights == 0) {
                    titles = "@blu@[Donator]-";
                }
                yell(titles + "" + playerName + ": "
                        + command.substring(5));
}

This should fix all your problems.

Read full topic

item.title: Icon help
item.dc:creator: @Rune-Nation Rune-Nation
item.description:
@Rune-Nation wrote:

[quote=“b15, post:2, topic:354388”]WRONG SECTION [ITS CLIENT SIDE] BUT I WILL STILL TRY TO HELP

go into client and go to cache folder and sprites and look for the doner icon and the owner and the mod icon.
change the number of the:
doner icon to the owners icon

im not sure about the rest. there is a guide in client tuts on how to add crowns correctly so skim through that and look at the folders that are edited and then fix the paths to each crown.[/quote]

Do not tell me its the wrong section untill you read my thing. All the icons are added already and in the client spirite folder. a mod has the mod crown the admin has admin crown but when a mod Private messages someone it shows the wrong crown. Its not that it ISNT added its that the codes are messed up in the source somewhere but i cant find it !

Read full topic

item.title: Icon help
item.dc:creator: @b15 b15
item.description:
@b15 wrote:

WRONG SECTION [ITS CLIENT SIDE] BUT I WILL STILL TRY TO HELP

go into client and go to cache folder and sprites and look for the doner icon and the owner and the mod icon.
change the number of the:
doner icon to the owners icon

im not sure about the rest. there is a guide in client tuts on how to add crowns correctly so skim through that and look at the folders that are edited and then fix the paths to each crown.

Read full topic
